4 right parenthesis space 16 to the power of 3 over 4 end exponent space equals space fourth root of 16 cubed end root space equals space left parenthesis fourth root of 16 right parenthesis cubed space equals left parenthesis space fourth root of 2 cross times 2 cross times 2 cross times 2 end root right parenthesis cubed equals 2 cubed equals 8
